endpoints_summary.summary: Get all memberships of the org
Create a org membership for a user with role
Update a org membership for a user with role

details.description:
Get a paginated list of all the organizations belonging to the group.
By default, this endpoint returns the organizations in alphabetical order of their name.

#### Required permissions

- `View Groups (group.read)`

- `View Organizations (group.org.list)`

200.description: A list of organizations in the group.

details.description: Get a paginated list of organizations you have access to.

parameters.description: If set, only return organizations within the specified group
parameters.name: group_id

parameters.description: If true, only return organizations that are not part of a group.
parameters.name: is_personal

parameters.description: Only return orgs whose slug exactly matches this value.
parameters.name: slug

parameters.description: Only return orgs whose name contains this value.
parameters.name: name

parameters.description: Expand the specified related resources in the response to include their attributes.
parameters.name: expand

200.description: A list of organizations you have access to.

details.description:
Get the full details of an organization.

#### Required permissions

- `View Organization (org.read)`

parameters.description: Expand the specified related resources in the response to include their attributes.
parameters.name: expand

200.description: Returns an instance of an organization

details.description:
Update the details of an organization

#### Required permissions

- `Edit Organization (org.edit)`

endpoints.summary: Get all memberships of the org

details.description:
Returns all memberships of the org

#### Required permissions

- `View Organization Memberships (org.membership.read)`

parameters.description: Order in which results are returned.
parameters.name: sort_order

200.description: List of org memberships is returned
